entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then northwest 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 34 in the evening and minus 55 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
